Shockwave/Firestarter/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Sixshot/Ares:




Shockwave waved a hand in the air.  "I estimate we are 75% done with our 
planning.  Though we will have more work when Unitron returns, and then even 
more.  I suggest a short recess to repower ourselves."

"Agreed, Shockwave." Firestarter said, walking out of the room and heading 
for his quarters.

Shockwave got up and left the conference room heading for his own quarters 
which had once been Vehement's.

---

Double Punch, Manterror, and Injector were still in the repair bay but were 
over 95% complete and would be out shortly.

---

With the rest of their army dead in their holographic battle in Iacon, 
Reflector leapt forward only to get a foot to his abdomens and he fell to the 
ground.

"Nice try." Sun Crusher smiled, slashing down but Reflector rolled out of the 
just in time and returned fire with an optic blast that nearly knocked 
Crusher off of his feet.  "Then again, this may take a little longer than I'd 
thought."

---

Outside of the Ramora Sixshot and Ares continued their perimeter patrol.

Transforming to space fighter mode, Sixshot lifted off into the air, Ares 
following his example.  Each armed a pair of missiles and their laser 
weaponry and were ready to wreak havoc on any intruders.  They then spotted 
Rainchark and flew towards him, Sixshot activatin a comm. link to the 
unidentified robot.

"Unidentified robot," he said refering to Rainchark, "identify yourself, your 
faction, and your intentions.  If you fail to do so you will get a one way 
ticket to the great junkyard in the sky!"
